The following commands are available to you via the pdelab> prompt.  This list may be incomplete as new commands are being added all the time.  For a complete list of the available commands check pdelab/src/terminal.cpp.  For a short description of the usage, either check pdelab/src/eventhandler.h or type _help_ under the pdelab> prompt.

Basic Commands

*exit

*quit

*#

*view

*help

*save

*load

*erase

Solver Commands

*sim

*resim

*script

Observer Commands

*set

*unset

*norm
